storyInfo:
Inside the Rhine headquarters, the Doctor and Saria find Control, who has been unreachable for some time.
After so many years apart, the former friends are finally reunited.

attributes.content: Oh, Director Muelsyse? Coming in for work this late at night?
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: Ugh... *cough*, yes, there's always more to do.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Your work must be exhausting.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: And who are these two?
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: Some very important business partners of ours.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: You don't recognize this one?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Uhh... Sorry, I'm not so good with heavily shrouded faces.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: This is the famous Originium theory scholar, Oripathy expert, and Catastrophe researcher—
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Oh... You! Your reputation precedes you! It's my lucky day, getting the chance to meet an amazing scientist like... you!
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.options: (This guy's never heard of me, has he?);......;(That worked?)

attributes.content: We have urgent business to attend to, so we'll be heading up now. If we get the chance, we should have lunch together sometime, okay?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Right. Don't let me keep you...
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: Wait, I thought you looked familiar. Aren't you that expert in... uh...
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: ...in the field of defensive materials.
Parvis...
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Rhine Lab has really expanded at an astonishing pace the last couple years, hasn't it?
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: A consequence is that our new little friends still have much to learn.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Two directors here at the same time...? I-I... I'd better get back to work! Please excuse me!
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: Ahah.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: You aren't going to tell them I'm back?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Forgive me, but my eyes aren't what they used to be. Have I met such a lovely Vouivre lady before?
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: If you've nothing else for me, I'd better get home. An old man like me needs his sleep.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Right, Director Muelsyse. Don't forget the black bean tea you owe me.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Phew... Saria, did he really just happen to be passing by?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: It's four in the morning.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Parvis normally would've gone home nine hours ago.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I knew it... He's not lining up behind either Ferdinand or Kristen until the last minute, when he's sure how the chips will fall.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: He's still calculating the odds, waiting to see.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I bet that even if Rhine Lab gets blasted to rubble, he'll walk out without a scratch.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: They've entered Rhine HQ.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Recon team, prepare to intercept.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Let's slow down a little.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: It's you...
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: I saw you fight Saria, and I'm pretty intrigued by your equipment.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Mind if I took a look?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Is this how you always greet your enemies before engaging, Rhodes Island elite operator?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Don't get the wrong idea. I'm not talking as a Rhodes Island elite operator there.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: As a mechanist, I respect all exceptional technology and its innovators—
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Which is why I wanted to ask how you'd feel before I took that special-looking staff of yours.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: You're a funny one, Mr. Mechanist.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: I was only going to meet with Saria, but you and your boss... that Doctor certainly gave me a bigger surprise.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: You know my name?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: You've looked into me too, haven't you?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: It's the habit of our kind to gather up as much information as we can before a fight.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Your name is in Rhine HQ's database, Ms. Ho'olheyak.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: But I don't buy that Ferdinand would hire a history scholar to hunt his coworkers down. That'd be silly, even for the impossible world of Columbian academia.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: It's my side gig.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: You research history for a side gig?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Wrong.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: I'm a historian. I'm just here to see a millennium-old prophecy come true.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Likewise, I believe our future is heading in a direction that'll lead us to certain hidden historical secrets—
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Just like you, I seek the truth.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: We're here.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Do you know how to find your scumbag boss, researcher?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: He should be in the control room right now.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: There's a vent around the corner. If you can get inside it, that's your quickest route to the control room.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: You'll want to hurry, though.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: We're about to have company.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: ...Officer.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: I knew you were on their side. You're weak-willed. You can't put your past with this criminal behind you.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: He's not a criminal yet, punk. You people don't have the power to convict. Not yet anyway.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: You're heading past the point of no return.
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: But why? You're all so exceptional. Why destroy your future? Why... didn't she take my advice?
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: This is about someone else, isn't it?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: I can say this to you for her, again.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Ugh—
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: Because we know what we're fighting for.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: To protect certain people... To protect certain rules from being trampled by people like that scumbag director. We don't hesitate. Ever.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: We aren't like you...
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Probing all the sides before you pick one—
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: And even going so far as to ask that dumb question before a fight!
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Urgh...!
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: Did you find out which way you're going?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: I think so...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Hop to it, then.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: What about you?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I have a crossbow. You don't. Worry about yourself, not me.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Take care of yourself.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Why aren't you going with her? I thought you came all this way to settle your score with him, too.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: I've got my own weapon.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: It's been a long time since we fought side-by-side.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: What are you talking about...? You mean back when we used to play those games?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Besides, I was the one always dragging you out to play.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Haha... thanks for that.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: I really miss those days... I mean it.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: The elevator up ahead will take us straight to Control's office.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: It's safer if we take the fire exit in the back.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I know, but aren't we in a hurry?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: It'll be faster if we head straight there, and run into less armed personnel along the way.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Wait, don't go over there—
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Whoopsie. I forgot this area's monitored...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Doctor, it's time for plan B.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Intruders spotted!
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: Here! Over here!
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: Grab the intrud—Wait, Director?!
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: Hello, Reggie.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: What are you doing here...? No, you don't have clearance anymore. I can't let you go any further...
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: When facing an intruder, hesitating only gives a chance for your enemy to strike.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Do you need me to teach you this all over again?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Shields up!
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: Prepare to stun! Target the intruder—Saria!
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: You pass, just barely.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Have the latest data been recorded?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Yes, they have.
Note the drones' positions.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Do not let the test subject's actions influence firsthand data collection.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Don't worry, Boss.
The firsthand data you want are right here in front of you.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Elena.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I'm glad you're safe.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I've worked under you for so many years now. Reading the slightest change in your expression has become part of my job—
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Your left eyebrow twitched ever so slightly. You're surprised.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Well, you are full of surprises.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: It's a relief to have you back—Those stupid new hires really need a fine researcher like you to discipline them.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: You want me to be a team leader?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: No, not a team leader.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: You see that key on the desk? Take it.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: You've more than proven your abilities. You don't need to be anyone's assistant anymore—Not mine, and not Dorothy's.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I want you to handle the next project as overseer.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: This key is a present I prepared for you. It's an all new... spacious laboratory. Your laboratory.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: No matter what kind of experiments you want to run, both Rhine Lab and I will fully support you.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Wonderful.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Have you considered letting me take over as Energy Director?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: That is not out of the question.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: You don't seem... particularly happy about my surprise.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: That's because no matter what kind of future you had in mind for me... my answer was always going to be 'no.'
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Set your staff down.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: What are you afraid of? That I'm going to betray you and ruin the moment you see your bright future manifesting, right before your final victory?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I might just consider doing that.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I don't understand. I've given you so much...
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I saw talent, diligence, and ambition in you.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: All three are necessary to achieve success. All three qualities that also define me.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Of course you wouldn't understand.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: If you actually thought so highly of me as you say—You'd have told me the truth behind the experiments.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: You'd tell me how you disregard the safety of your test subjects, how you used me to keep tabs on Dorothy, and how when you finally have no more use for me, you'll wipe me out along with all the evidence of your crimes.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: You think I'm some stupid little girl who listens to everything you say?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Even with Olivia's nudging, it took me till the moment you make your move for me to finally open my eyes!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: You aren't ready, Elena. I was afraid you would be shaken, and here you are.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: You've never trusted me.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: You don't trust anyone, only yourself.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: So why should I trust you again... Why should I trust your promises now?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I've never given anyone more chances than I've given you.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: You know what? You're more like me than my own children.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I've poured much blood and sweat into you. Even now, if it's what you want, I would still welcome you at my side—
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: This is the last thing I'll ever ask of you—
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Please shut up, Boss.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Take your 'present' and your fake sincerity and stay far away from me.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Starting today, I, Elena Urbica, am no longer your stupid little assistant or your pawn.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Ferdinand Clooney, you're fired.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Director Clooney!
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: Grab her! Get the rioter!
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: Hngh...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Director, are you alright?
attributes.name: Rhine Defense Member

attributes.content: I'm fine.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Elena...
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Stop... Stop looking at me... like you care about me at all.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: It... disgusts me.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: You say I don't understand you... but you've never truly understood me either.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Perhaps... I actually hesitated, worried in that brief moment just now.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I wasn't worried about the ruckus you were causing. I was worried about you.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I really... didn't want to see things come to this.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Those words...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: *cough*... Right back at you.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: *pant*...*pant*... What do we do? The Defense guys just keep coming and coming.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Ferdinand's got all the sites covered. It doesn't matter how much of a fight Saria can put up. There's no way she can take on so many at once.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: We're counting on you, Director Muelsyse.

attributes.content: Me...? No way! I don't know how to fight.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: All the running around to dodge their attacks is exhausting already...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Don't you hear all my panting, Doctor?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: Didn't you quite ingeniously cover for Saria just now?;As long as you stop deliberately wasting time...

attributes.content: You... You know?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: Saria hasn't been to Rhine HQ in a while. How'd she remember which areas are monitored?;You've been blocking Saria's line of sight, intentionally or otherwise.
You've been pretty calm ever since you heard me guess this is where Control is.

attributes.content: I... Ahh!
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: They almost got me...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Doctor... You pulled me back? You... You'd still do that for me?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Even though you've figured out that I might have other ideas?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: You're free to have other ideas.;And I don't care where you stand.
I want you to help Saria.
This is for the benefit of both Rhodes Island and Rhine Lab.;This is for the safety of Columbia and all lands.;And this is for you, too.

attributes.content: That's the second time you've saved me now, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Let's call this my way of repaying the favor, then. I'll stand with you guys at least this once and help Saria get where she wants to go.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: You hear me, water molecules?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Step up and give these nice people a little kissy, and wash away all the dust under our feet!
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: The elf wavered.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: What a poor soul... She's always looking for some kind of promise of the future.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Who would willingly admit she and her race belong only to the past?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Can this Dr. {@nickname} really give her what Kristen can't?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Ma'am, Saria has broken through the blockade.
attributes.name: Columbian Mercenary

attributes.content: Let her meet her old friend, then.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: I still have other work to finish... Looks like this mechanist and I will just have to catch up next time.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: —That is, if he survives the power armor.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: How long has it been since I was here?
One thousand four hundred and ninety-seven days.
Perhaps we were already enemies when we said our goodbyes.
Will we still be friends when we meet again?
You're back, Saria.
Hello, Kristen.
attributes.name: Saria
